EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 2 - Zero Emission
EmailTemplate.subject: Every step to zero emissions brings a benefit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Step-by-step to the zero-emission network Many ways to cut carbon emissions A radio network with zero carbon emissions won’t happen overnight.
Modernize base station sites with Single RAN software to share resources. Optimize with energy-saving software. Use more efficient power systems and renewable energy.
Every step will bring you greater cost savings. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
